author: jaliya
msg: RMMessageContext will keep the message properties like, sync, hasResponse, SourceURL etc..

author: jaliya
msg: Added two new constants to store the port number for the client side listener

author: jaliya
msg: Modified the RMSender so that it can handle the response. If the service
request has a response then RMSender will wait till it get the Response.
else it will wait till the ack  without returning to the client.

author: jaliya
msg: A boolean field was added to RMMessageContext to hold the sending state.
This field will hold the state so that the Sender can decide whether the message
should be sent synchronously or asynchronously

author: jaliya
msg: Sender will now handle both synchronous and asynchronous CreateSequenceRequests and ServiceRequests
